name: The Caretaker (42Parsec)
description:
This is a story about a simple cemetery caretaker who got into an interesting story with a talking shovel and animated skeletons.

Control: 

Z - Resurrection of the undead

TAB - Skeleton Improvements

Space - Attack

WASD - movement

LMB - Magic Arrow

E - Raise/Interaction

Team of novice game developers(42Parsec). This is our first seriously project! 

Credits: 

AProxima - programmer

Novilon - game designer and scenario

FazR51 - visual artist
